name: Working Around
description: I make this Game for the GameJam MyFirsGameJam: Summer 2020, as the theme is "Change", I decided to make a game where you have to change your Job constantly and every Job is a different minigame. How ever my lack of expirience lead me to only make 2 minigames. But I will probably update it later as I loved developing it. I hope you enjoy it, have fun!
